sentence.Network_en: She was very glum and was obviously missing her children.
sentence.Network_cn: 她郁郁寡欢，显然在惦念自己的孩子们。

sentence.Network_en: The players sat there with glum looks on their faces.
sentence.Network_cn: 队员们愁眉苦脸地坐在那儿。

sentence.Network_en: He was a charming mixture of glum and glee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个很有魅力的人,时而忧伤时而欢笑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... mood（ 心情，情绪）； glum（ 阴郁的，忧愁的）； memory（ 回忆，记忆）；.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... somber adj． 忧郁的，阴暗的 | glum adj 闷闷不乐的，阴郁的 murky adj． 黑暗的，朦胧的.
大学英语精读单词表(第六册) - 豆丁网 ... worrier n. 担心的人 glum a. 阴郁的， 阴沉的 gene n. 基因.
Love is a Fallacy 词汇(Vocabulary) | 英语大学 ... deposit 放下，搁下 glum 忧郁的，闷闷不乐的 ember [常用复]余烬,余火.

list.abs: Harris nodded , looking glum ., 哈里斯点了点头 , 满腹心事.
Three glum faces mutely gave him his answer ., 三张愁苦的面孔已经给了他那些孩子的答复.
glum expressions , faces , features ., 忧伤的神情 , 面孔 , 相貌.
He looks pretty glum today , maybe you should say something nice to him ., 他今天看上去很不开心 , 也许该跟他说些好听的话.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: related to dialect glum 'to frown', variant of gloom

entry.tran: 闷闷不乐的；忧郁的；愁闷的
entry.def: Someone who is glum is sad and quiet because they are disappointed or unhappy about something.

example.ex: She was very glum and was obviously missing her children.
example.tran: 她郁郁寡欢，显然在惦念自己的孩子们。

sentences.sentence: "a saturnine, almost misanthropic young genius"- Bruce Bliven

sentences.en: She laughed at his glum face.
sentences.cn: 她嘲笑他闷闷不乐的脸。
